meanings.definition: The study or practice of predicting what will happen or be needed in the future.
meanings.sent1: In futuristics, experts analyze trends to anticipate future needs.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading about futuristics to understand upcoming changes.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about futuristics predictions.
meanings.sent4: His accuracy in futuristics was like having a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The class on futuristics painted a vivid picture of tomorrow's possibilities.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the future or the study of the future.
meanings.sent1: The futuristics conference showcased innovative technologies.
meanings.sent2: Their futuristics approach to problem-solving impressed the team.
meanings.sent3: The movie had a futuristic theme, with futuristics gadgets and designs.
meanings.sent4: Her style was described as futuristics, always ahead of the trends.
meanings.sent5: The futuristics vision of the architect transformed the city skyline.
